column5: not a trophy by any means but a quick jump on the seaon this one was pulled out on december 6th we had 5 hits in 2 hours also been out the past 3 days for a few hours in "prime" time and not a bite.
Nice Pike. Looks pretty chilly out there.
Great report and pic BassAsin Beauty pike for sure Thanks for sharing Leechman
just a little 24 incher and it was 18 below and 26 below with the wind
an obvious addict.   the colder , the more precious the few .
Well done,  I'm curious at what it went for.  They sometimes vary on their prey early in the season.   (everything or just about!!)  Seriously,  What was the bait?
nice man, i cant wait to get out. My goal is to catch my first ice pike, what were you using? if you dont mind telling.

i dont know if i can tell you that! but if you promise not to tell anybody i was using some frozen smelts we net out of the lake in the spring. give them the odd jig and we do well the average in that lake is about 5 lbs so big smelt are on the menu!
ok cool. I'd like to get into some pike, but last year i only used those little pinheads or whatever, big scoop for $5. I'll have to go big or go home.
